name: WCF Employee
query:
SELECT
    emp.wcf_number AS "wcf_number::120",
    emp.first_name AS "firstname::120",
    emp.middle_name AS "middlename::120",
    emp.last_name AS "lastname::120",
    emp.gender AS "gender::75",
    emp.date_of_birth AS "dob::70",
    SUM(CASE WHEN sd.salary_component = 'Basic' THEN sd.amount ELSE 0 END) AS "basicpay::100",
    SUM(ss.gross_pay) AS "grosspay::100",
    ss.designation AS "job_title::200",
    'PERMANENT' AS "employement_category::150",
    emp.national_identity AS "national_id::200",
    IF(emp.cell_number IS NOT NULL AND emp.cell_number <> '', emp.cell_number, 'None') AS "employee_phone::200"
FROM `tabSalary Slip` ss
JOIN `tabEmployee` emp ON ss.employee = emp.name
LEFT JOIN `tabSalary Detail` sd ON sd.parent = ss.name AND sd.salary_component = 'Basic'
WHERE ss.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
GROUP BY ss.employee_name, ss.designation, emp.gender, emp.date_of_birth
HAVING SUM(ss.gross_pay) > 0
